props.name: activeClass
props.desc: The CSS class to use when the item becomes activated (defaults to "x-menu-item-active")

props.name: canActivate
props.desc: True if this item can be visually activated (defaults to false)

props.name: handler
props.desc: A function that will handle the click event of this menu item (defaults to undefined)

props.name: hideDelay
props.desc: Length of time in milliseconds to wait before hiding after a click (defaults to 100)

props.name: hideOnClick
props.desc: True to hide the containing menu after this item is clicked (defaults to true)

events.name: activate
events.desc: Fires when this item is activated

events.name: click
events.desc: Fires when this item is clicked

events.name: deactivate
events.desc: Fires when this item is deactivated
